PASSIVE - EVIL'S BANE: Against Villain opponents, Ghost Rider's chance to place a Judgement increases by 20%. Additionally his Armor Rating and Critical Rating are increased by 351.22.
JUDGMENTS: Ghost Rider can see his opponent’s transgressions and place Judgments upon them. Each Judgement can only be applied once and lasts indefinitely.
The duration of each Judgment’s Secondary Effect is increased by 75% for each Judgment already active.
FINISH A 5 HIT COMBO WITH A LIGHT ATTACK: Judgement of Spite: 70% chance.
Secondary: Inflicts Bleed, dealing 89.25 Direct Damage over 3 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Judgement of Malice: 80% chance.
Secondary: Gain a Lifesteal Passive effect for 5.75 seconds, allowing Ghost Rider to steal 28.7 Health with each attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Judgement of Pride: 70% chance. Secondary: Fate Seals the opponent, immediately Nullifying all Buffs, and preventing any new Buffs from activating for 5 seconds.
PASSIVE: A lack of blood provides full immunity to Bleeding.
Being wreathed in Hellfire provides full Immunity to Incinerate
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Judgement of Anger: 80% chance.
Secondary: Drains 18% of the opponent’s max Power over 2 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Judgement of Guilt: 100% chance. Secondary: Inflicts Damnation upon the opponent through the Penance Stare for 4 seconds, dealing 37.4 Direct Damage. Opponent's under Damnation are also Power Locked, Heal Blocked and Fate Sealed, all of which are unaffected by Ability Accuracy modifications. Fate Seal immediately Nullifies all Buffs, and prevents any new Buffs from activating.
When Damnation ends, all Judgments are removed from the opponent and can be applied again.

Secondary: Gain a Lifesteal Passive effect for 5.75 seconds, allowing Ghost Rider to steal 873.28 Health with each attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Judgement of Pride: 70% chance. Secondary: Fate Seals the opponent, immediately Nullifying all Buffs, and preventing any new Buffs from activating for 5 seconds.
PASSIVE: A lack of blood provides full immunity to Bleeding.
Being wreathed in Hellfire provides full Immunity to Incinerate
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Judgement of Anger: 80% chance.
Secondary: Drains 18% of the opponent’s max Power over 2 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Judgement of Guilt: 100% chance. Secondary: Inflicts Damnation upon the opponent through the Penance Stare for 4 seconds, dealing 1137.4 Direct Damage. Opponent's under Damnation are also Power Locked, Heal Blocked and Fate Sealed, all of which are unaffected by Ability Accuracy modifications. Fate Seal immediately Nullifies all Buffs, and prevents any new Buffs from activating.
When Damnation ends, all Judgments are removed from the opponent and can be applied again.
